titleStmt.title: Single songs, and dialogues, in the musical play of Mars & Venus. Perform'd with the Anatomist, or the Sham Doctor. Set to musick by Mr. Finger, and Mr. John Eccles
titleStmt.author: Motteux, Peter Anthony, 1660-1718.
Finger, Godfrey, ca. 1660-1730.
Eccles, John, d. 1735.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. Heptinstall, for the authors, and sold by John Hare musical instrument seller, at the Golden Viol in St. Paul's Church-Yard, and at his shop in Freeman's-Yard in Cornhill. And by John Welch musical instrument-maker in ordinary to his Majesty, at the Golden Harp and Hautboy in Catharine-street against Somerset-house Water-Gate in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: Catharine-street against Somerset-house Water-Gate in the Strand
